Class AStar

Namespace
Petrosik.Pathfinding
Assembly
PetrosikUtility.dll

Slightly modifed A*

Cardinal directions only, no diagonals

Supports pathfinding for tile traversability

Parameters

BaseClearArea GraphicsPath

Size of the grid(world units)

GridScale int

How many path units are in 1 world unit

SearchRange float

How far should pathfinding search by default(world units)

MaxSegmentCount int

After how many path units should the path make new "node" in the output. (0 for no limit)
